Class DataSourceBinding

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.script.SimpleBindings
      • simple.escp.fill.DataSourceBinding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>, javax.script.Bindings

    public class DataSourceBinding
extends javax.script.SimpleBindings
    This class will provide value from DataSource as global variables that can be read inside script directly.
